snippet.title: Hellsweeper VR - Quest Gameplay Trailer  l Meta Quest + Meta Rift S
snippet.description:
Hellsweeper VR will officially drop on 21 September 2023! Pre-orders available now Meta Quest 2! https://metaque.st/3LzbqbR

FEATURES
Hellsweeper VR is an intense action-combat first-person experience. Traverse the underworld, gain mastery of your weapons and elemental magic, or fall to the unrelenting onslaught of hell's twisted souls. Dare to descend into hell.

• Intense limitless movement: A daring, no-holes-barred locomotion system that pushes the limits of even the bravest of VR players.
• Master your combat style: Summon, wield & master various weapons and magic combinations.
• Survive in various game modes: Various singleplayer and co-op modes. Survive together, Die together.
• Content-rich experience with high replayability: Conquer 18 maps, over 10 enemy types with elemental variants and multiple mission types, offering a unique gameplay experience with every run.
